mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parkdata_history (serialNo, spaceNo, carNo, enterType, enterDate, enterUser, discountCode, leaveType, leaveDate, leaveUser, spotCount, userRemark, spotNo, gasan, discAmount, cutAmount, saleAmount, receiveAmount, recpDt, gojiState, remark, insertUser, insertDate, insertIp, del_Tag, chasu, proceTag) VALUES (#{serialNo}, #{spaceNo}, #{carNo}, #{enterType}, #{enterDate}, #{enterUser}, #{discountCode}, #{leaveType}, #{leaveDate}, #{leaveUser}, #{spotCount}, #{userRemark}, #{spotNo}, #{gasan}, #{discAmount}, #{cutAmount}, #{saleAmount}, #{receiveAmount}, #{recpDt}, #{gojiState}, #{remark}, #{insertUser}, #{insertDate}, #{insertIp}, #{del_Tag}, #{chasu}, #{proceTag})
